title: Jennifer Aniston Redefines "Expectation vs. Reality" in a Hilarious Instagram Post
text:
View photos Photo credit: Variety - Instagram More

From Harper's BAZAAR

Jennifer Aniston proved that she's already a pro at Instagram by posting a behind-the-scenes snap from a recent photo shoot.

Aniston joked that she was "asking you to think I woke up like this" with two photos: one before and one with the finished product.

The Friends star pulled a funny face and could be seen wearing socks with sandals in one of the snaps.

Having already broken Instagram the day she joined earlier this month, Jennifer Aniston decided to give fans an amusing, behind-the-scenes look at her recent Variety photo shoot.

In the finished article, Aniston can be seen wearing a white sweater, a cream fedora, and nothing else. The actress looks completely chic in the snap, with everything from her trademark hair to her subtle makeup captured perfectly.

However, in the "before" snap, Aniston's makeup artist and hairstylist go to work, while the star pulls a pretty "fed up" expression. Her fluffy socks and chunky sandals, which obviously aren't visible in the finished photo, only add to her comical pose.

Aniston wants to make it clear that the reality of a glamorous photo shoot is often a totally different story. Referencing Notting Hill, Aniston wrote, "I'm just a girl....standing with hair and makeup. A stylist. A photographer. A lighting crew, wind machine, props, and a computer .... asking you to think I woke up like this. 😬😑"

Having already provided us with the Friends reunion we so longed for, Aniston has made it clear that her Instagram account is what the world has been missing.

You Might Also Like
description: The finished photo cropped out her fluffy socks and chunky sandals. 😂
